events.message: I just received my order, but the laptop screen is cracked and shows multiple scratches, which is very disappointing.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect related to the damaged laptop screen.
A support agent specializing in defective products has been assigned to handle this case for the customer.
Hello! I’m very sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop screen. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us photos of the cracked screen and the packaging so we can assess the damage and expedite a solution?
I have attached several photos showing the cracked screen from different angles as well as the box it arrived in, which looks fine.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a free replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement laptop as I need it urgently for work, thank you for the quick response.
We have processed the replacement order, and you will receive a tracking number shortly. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Checking in to ensure your replacement laptop arrived in perfect condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard further issues, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need additional help.
